extendedInfo.description: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, Sega CD, and Master System/Mark III emulator based on portions of Genesis Plus/Gens/Picodrive (GPL), designed and tested on the original Droid/Milestone, Xoom, Galaxy S2, Nexus 7, and Xperia Play, but works on many devices with similar specs. MD.emu features accurate emulation is able to properly display graphics in game such as Panorama Cotton, Star Control, and the VS mode in Sonic 2. Sega CD support is currently considered beta, please do not report game-specific issues with it yet.Features include:* Very accurate sound emulation with high quality re-sampling* SVP chip support for Virtua Racing (needs a fast device)* CD emulation via loading CUE or TOC+BIN files (requires USA/Japan/Europe BIOS)* CUE files support external audio tracks in Ogg Vorbis & Wav (PCM, ADPCM, etc) formats* 6-button controller and 4-player multitap support* Gun support (Menacer and Justifier)* Cheat code support using .pat file format (same as Kega Fusion, Gens, Genesis Plus GX, etc.)* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states.* Supports ROM-based games in .bin, .smd, .gen, and .sms formats, optionally in zip files* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls in addition to keyboard controls (up to 4 touches supported at once), and an Xperia Play optimized button layout* Multiplayer-capable Wiimote/Classic Controller/Wii U Pro Controller, iControlPad, and Zeemote JS1 support (Wii controllers not yet working on Android 4.2), also works with any generic Bluetooth/USB gamepad supported by AndroidNo ROMs are included with this app and must be supplied by the user. A number of public domain games/demos are available at www.pdroms.de. Transfer games anywhere to your internal storage/SD card and browse to them from within the app (default SD card directory is /mnt/sdcard).Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:https://twitter.com/rakashaziVisit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps (including Snes9x EX). Please report any crashes or device-specific problems via email (include your device name and OS version) so future updates continue to run on as many devices as possible.

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: At first I was skeptical about downloading the app, simply because I wasn\'t sure how it would perform...  I\'m glad that I purchased this incredible app..  Plays my Sega Genesis and master system games near flawlessly..!  Sega cd is still beta but playable..  Got Lunar: the silver star story and the Terminator to work..  100/100! A must buy! Great job and thanks Robert for such a great app!
reviews.author: James Romer

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is the ONLY SEGA emulator that runs full speed on my SG3. Well worth the small amount of money!  CAN\'T WAIT FOR SEGA CD to run!
reviews.author: Donald Dube

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Yes I love this app it\'s a perfect app for replaying all of those Sega Genesis games in your collection and some new ones flawlessly! Also the use of wii remotes even wii U pro as a controller is a great plus. Great job on the app thanks Robert!!
reviews.author: Mark Ozaeta

reviews.title: What an emulator should be!
reviews.comment: This emulator is 5 stars in every field. It does what it says without any added bloat that a lot of devs think people want. This app goes perfectly with the devs other emulators perfectly. I can now play all my Game Gear, Sega Master System, Genesis, and 32X roms at 100% quality. I want to say a big thanks to the dev for making such high quality, affordable emulators for Android. Please don\'t stop what you\'re doing and hopefully we\'ll see a PlayStation or Nintendo DS emulator some time.
reviews.author: Jason Moody

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: All in one works flawless on xperia play, some master system games have a bit strange sound but by far the best Sega emu I tried
reviews.author: Torbj\303\266rn Ivarsson

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Great job by the dev., now I can play all my Sega genesis titled on the go.
reviews.author: Paul Rodriguez

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best emulator to play Panorama Cotton, is more stable than my PC MegaDrive emu, great stuff and worth the pennies :D
reviews.author: Lauren Newman

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It lags at times (maybe correlating to when I quick save?) but it\'s a minor issue and may just mean I need a new phone. Excellent emulator, thanks
reviews.author: Chris Aanerud

reviews.title: SFX delay
reviews.comment: Since last update, the sound is delayed. For example, if I make Sonic jump, half a second later, the jump sfx plays. Needs fixing, otherwise, all good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lunar and Vay ROMS not working on Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Bought this app for 4 games in particular. It works great for Shining Force CD, not Lunar is not working. Once it gets past the title screen and into the game, after the first few boxes of dialogue nothing seems to function. Hoping this gets fixed soon.  Vay also seems to have the same problem. I get through the intro anime, then once the first few boxes of dialogue happens it becomes unresponsive and I can\'t do anything.
reviews.author: Bryan Ricke

reviews.title: Awesome !!!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded Robert\'s snes emulator, and as soon as I played it I didn\'t hesitate to buy this. It works perfectly I can now play Road Rash on my phone with a Wii classic controller, amazing!!!!!! Worth every penny!!!!  Thanks Robert.
reviews.author: Mark May

reviews.title: Great Mega Drive Emu
reviews.comment: Plays flawlessly all my Japanese favorites from the Mega Drive era (on Galaxy Note): Aleste, El Viento, Gley Lancer, Gynoug, Hellfire, Thunder Force series, Streets of  Rage series, etc. Well done!
reviews.author: Christian Zmasek

reviews.title: Simply the best.
reviews.comment: Bought for sega cd support. Lunar TSS works flawlessly. Lunar EB freezes on opening screen, but hopefully a fix will be out soon. Otherwise flawless!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
reviews.author: Joe Davis

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Excellent app!
reviews.author: sean cheeseman

reviews.title: Very good!!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent! I\'m investing on buying the other emulators form this developer!!! :) any plans on adding 32x to this emulator?
reviews.author: Crystal F.

reviews.title: Works well!
reviews.comment: All it needs is the ability to position buttons manually, and maybe allow a custom background for the black space.
reviews.author: Thomas Quinn

reviews.title: Best Emulator Ever :D
reviews.comment: One thing that kept me from buying this emulator is will it run perfectly and most importantly will it sound perfect and it did exactly both and more then just that this app is worth every penny i love it so far and its a huge value its 3 emulators in one it plays sega genesis sega master system and sega cd whats not to love about this app :3 (And sorry for improper puncuation and maybe grammer doing this in a hurry sorry)
reviews.author: CubicBurrito45

reviews.title: A Top Notch Emulator
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a few Genesis emulators and this is one of the best. I am floored that it can play Virtua Racing. It pays great on my Toshiba Thrive. The touch controls are spot on and I can get through the games without my Bluetooth gamepad. You can tweak so many settings. I could go on.
reviews.author: Vinny Alascia

reviews.title: Best MD emulator
reviews.comment: Have tried a few and this is the best. Has run every MD and MS game I have tried, smoothly, no issues. Also runs megacd games which is fantastic, a few are a bit glictchy and some, batman returns, I cannot get to work. However still extremely impressive. would benefit from 32x support and also game covers for the interface page. That said if you want to play Sega classics on your droid, this is the app to do it. Also had fun showing it to office pals with iphones. Toned down their smugness for a few hours.
reviews.author: Drew Deckard

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Just amazing.Nothing else to say
reviews.author: A Google User
